languages.text: {n}Похоже, этот воитель Императора одарен скорее мощью, чем коварством и умением строить планы. Отсутствие какой-либо стратегии он неумело пытается прикрыть интригующими отговорками.{/n}

{n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Похоже, этот воитель Императора одарен скорее мощью, чем коварством и умением строить планы. Отсутствие какой-либо стратегии он неумело пытается прикрыть интригующими отговорками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength rather than any cunning or ingenuity. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

{n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength rather than any cunning or ingenuity. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

{n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength rather than any cunning or ingenuity. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

{n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

languages.text: {n}看起来，帝皇的这位战士仅仅是空有一身蛮力，头脑并不怎么出色。他之所以会这么说，只是打算掩饰他完全没有任何逃脱计划的事实。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看起来，帝皇的这位战士仅仅是空有一身蛮力，头脑并不怎么出色。他之所以会这么说，只是打算掩饰他完全没有任何逃脱计划的事实。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece que este guerrero del Emperador está dotado de fuerza bruta, pero no de astucia e ingenio. Intenta torpemente ocultar su falta de estrategia con tentadoras evasivas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que este guerrero del Emperador está dotado de fuerza bruta en vez de astucia e ingenio. Intenta torpemente ocultar su falta de estrategia con tentadoras evasivas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この皇帝の戦士は、狡猾さや独創性よりも、むしろ腕力に恵まれているようだ。不器用な彼は、逃げるための戦略がまったくないことを、言いよどみの裏に隠そうとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この皇帝の戦士は、狡猾さや独創性よりも、むしろ腕力に恵まれているようだ。不器用な彼は、逃げるための戦略がまったくないことを、言いよどみの裏に隠そうとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dieser Krieger des Imperators ist offenbar mit brachialer Kraft gesegnet, aber nicht mit List oder Gerissenheit. Er bemüht sich ungelenk, seinen völligen Mangel an Fluchtstrategien hinter verlockenden Ausweichmanövern zu verbergen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieser Krieger des Imperators ist offenbar eher mit brachialer Kraft gesegnet denn mit List oder Gerissenheit. Er bemüht sich ungelenk, seinen völligen Mangel an Fluchtstrategien hinter verlockenden Ausweichmanövern zu verbergen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il semble que ce guerrier de l'Empereur soit doté d'une force brute plutôt que d'une finesse ou une intelligence particulière. Il tente maladroitement de cacher qu'il n'a aucune idée d'évasion en jouant au fanfaron.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il semble que ce guerrier de l'Empereur soit doté d'une force brute plutôt que d'une finesse ou une intelligence particulière. Il tente maladroitement de cacher qu'il n'a aucune idée d'évasion en jouant au fanfaron.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İmparator'un bu savaşçısı, kaba kuvvet açısından kutsanmış olsa da kurnazlık ve beceriklilik konusunda sınıfta kalmış. Stratejik yoksunluğunu beceriksizce saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It appears this warrior of the Emperor is blessed with brute strength but is neither cunning nor ingenious. He is clumsily attempting to hide his total lack of strategy for escaping behind tantalising evasions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İmparator'un bu savaşçısı kaba kuvvet açısından kutsanmış olsa da kurnazlık ve beceriklilik konusunda sınıfta kalmış. Cezbedici kaçış planlarının yoksunluğunu beceriksizce saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
